_comment: Claude Code settings for Gmail drafting workflow via gogcli
_purpose: Allows Claude to CREATE and UPDATE drafts, but CANNOT send emails. User reviews and sends manually via Gmail WebUI or mobile app.

_workflow.description: Safe drafting workflow for human-in-the-loop email review
steps: 1. Claude creates draft using 'gog gmail drafts create'
2. Claude can update draft using 'gog gmail drafts update'
3. User reviews draft in Gmail WebUI or Android/iOS app
4. User manually clicks Send when satisfied
blocked_operations: gog gmail send - direct email sending
gog gmail drafts send - sending drafts
gog gmail drafts delete - deleting drafts (optional safety)

drafts_create.note: Creates draft in Drafts folder, does NOT send

drafts_update.note: Updates existing draft, does NOT send

drafts_send.note: BLOCKED - this actually sends the email
